t_scene_info.dialogue: This is my hairstyle, which I love playing with.
As you can clearly see, it looks just like a veil. It's clear and easily visible.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is irrelevant. I want to know if I can fix my hair issue.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Well, this is an enchantment. There's no way to turn it off, unless...

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Unless? I must be getting close.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Oh dear... If you get too close, you won't like what she'll do.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm not sure who it is, but what has happened to Gensokyo is humiliating. I look completely unacceptable.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Unacceptable? Gee, looks like you had a bad experience with this enchantment.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm not usually affected by incidents on any scale but this one?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is something that may never end.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Just look at my absurd appearance. I can't write for the Daily Bunbunmaru looking like this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How can Hatate expect to see me with this hair? She might be affected too!

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm sure you're struggling not to smile.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I will always smile. This is too fun!

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Don't lie to me. I know you find my rants amusing.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I have too much respect for you.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've had enough of your lies. I know you're enjoying my current predicament.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you want more, just come for my show!
